pull.title: bitcoind doesn't build on Windows
pull.body: MinGW doesn't support fork(), thus daemonizing should be disabled on Windows

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: No longer fork on Windows as MinGW does not have support for fork() or setsid()

events.body: jgarzik pointed out that bitcoin used to properly daemonize on 0.3.18 on Windows (only bitcoin -daemon not bitcoind -daemon).  This needs more research.
